item.description: Anybody that is serious about having fun, making new diverse friends and of course meeting women should definitely come. I am going to have the meetup place at Japanica a restaurant that is really close to the main venue for the night. After everybody is situated we will then bounce to Murphys. Depending on how the scene is we could always go to another venue.
item.how_to_find_us: If you can't find me text me 860-922-1595 Roca
item.name: Friday Night Sarge Murphy and Scarletti's in Farmington
